module.name: HTML
module.param: Home > Sideview Editor - It has moved!

module.name: HTML
module.param:
The Sideview Editor has moved. Instead of being in Sideview Utils it is now in the "Sideview Admin Tools" app. You can get Sideview Admin Tools for free, and under the same Internal Use license agreement as Sideview Utils. Download it from our website or look for it on Splunkbase. (be aware that in general the version on Splunkbase may be slightly older).

Also if you are a current customer under a Sideview Developer License, everything in that agreement extends to all of the code and all of the tools that we provide in Sideview Admin Tools as well.

Please contact us with any questions. The same goes for any feedback at all.



Go to our website to download the Sideview Admin Tools App
